casebody.data:
Jeffrey HUGGINS, Employee
v.
MARLATEX CORPORATION, Employer
and
New Hampshire Insurance, Carrier. No. 188A15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Jeffrey C. Huggins, for Huggins, Jeffrey. Cameron Sherod Wesley, Charlotte, for Marlatex Corporation, et al. David Galbavy, Charlotte, for Marlatex Corporation, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by the Plaintiff on the 8th of June 2015 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30, and the motion to dismiss the appeal for lack of substantial constitutional question filed by the Defendants, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the motion to dismiss the appeal is

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
